pages.title: Strong Enriching Catalyst
pages.text: Resource needed:$(li)x4 Blank Nuggets$(li)x4 Waste$(br2)This Catalyst can be used to generate Strong Enriching Water by Throwing it in Undergarden Enriching Water

pages.name: Strong Enriching Water
pages.text: To obtain different items you can drop :$(li)Blank Nuggets$(li)Blank Pebbles$(li)Blank Dust$(br)
